column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////A note on the infamous lines and crowds: Worth it
column2: but don't be expecting an intimate date setting
column3: especially on weekends. Waited only ~15 minutes in line when they opened their doors on a Saturday morning and felt #blessed
column4: but seating was a whole other beast. Our group of 4 had trouble finding a table together
column5: and we were forced to awkwardly sit at the bar-style stools facing the windows and eat for a while before the large common table opened up and we literally sprinted to claim them.
